statements: DELETE FROM customer_payments WHERE customer_id = 1001 AND payment_amount = 1500.00;
DELETE FROM customer_payments WHERE card_expiry = '2023-12-31' AND cvv = 123;
DELETE FROM payment WHERE payment_id = 100 AND payment_date = '2022-01-15';
DELETE FROM payment WHERE customer_id = 50 AND payment_amount > 1000;
DELETE FROM transactions WHERE customer_id = 100 AND transaction_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM payment_methods WHERE method_type = 'Credit' AND customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM customers WHERE customer_email LIKE '%@example.com%');
DELETE FROM customer_payment_methods WHERE customer_id = 2002 AND method_id = 1;
DELETE FROM billing_addresses WHERE customer_id = 1001 AND zip_code = '12345';
